valueProps.text: Exclusive offers with car rental partners

facts.text: Lufthansa offers flights to over 200 destinations.
facts.evidence: travel with Lufthansa to over 200 destinations

facts.text: Round trip is the current trip type.
facts.evidence: Round trip is the current trip type

facts.text: Additional fare options are available for personal travel.
facts.evidence: With the personal travel additional fare options are available.

facts.text: Lufthansa offers a student product for those planning to study abroad.
facts.evidence: Planning for your studies abroad can be a daunting task. But not to worry, we've got you covered!

facts.text: Lufthansa provides a tarmac delay plan and customer support in the US.
facts.evidence: Here you can find important info about our tarmac delay plan, customer support and more.

facts.text: Lufthansa offers exclusive benefits with hotel partners.
facts.evidence: Our hotel partner offers you a range of accommodation worldwide at the best price.

facts.text: Lufthansa provides a 10% discount and donation option with Onboard Delights.
facts.evidence: Save 10% and donate 10% to the help alliance at the same time.

facts.text: Lufthansa's primary website language is English.
facts.evidence: Country and language selection which opens a new modal; currently:US

facts.text: Lufthansa offers free on-board messaging with FlyNet®.
Lufthansa offers exclusive car rental discounts or extra miles.
facts.evidence: Get discounts or extra miles – now with our car rental partners.
